title: The Caterpillar and the wild animals
creator_credit: Pat Baldwin, Gerard H. Baldwin and American Educational Films
brief_description: Based on a Masai folk tale this animated story depicts the life of a caterpillar who grew tired of his journey through the jungle and of being the prey of hungry birds and insects and looking like a leaf. Suitable for primary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Pat Baldwin, Gerard H. Baldwin and American Educational Films
